name: Forest Spider
description: A dog-sized spider with glistening fangs and bristly legs. Its many eyes reflect the dim forest light.

name: Giant Spider
description: A massive arachnid the size of a horse, its body armored with thick chitin plates. Venom drips from its fangs.

name: Goblin
description: A small, wiry creature with green skin, pointed ears, and a nasty grin. It brandishes a rusty dagger.

name: Goblin Chief
description: A hulking goblin wearing a crude iron crown. Scars criss-cross its muscular arms, and it wields a heavy mace with practiced ease.

name: Wild Wolf
description: A lean gray wolf with bared fangs and matted fur. Its amber eyes track your every movement with predatory focus.

name: Bandit
description: A rough-looking human in tattered clothes, wielding a notched short sword. Desperation burns in their eyes.

name: Cave Bat Swarm
description: A shrieking cloud of bats bursts from the darkness, their leathery wings beating the air in a frenzy.

name: Stone Golem
description: An animated construct of rough-hewn stone, glowing runes etched into its surface. It moves with surprising speed for its bulk.

name: Thorn Vine
description: A writhing mass of barbed vines that lashes out at anything that moves. Thorns drip with a sticky, irritating sap.

name: Venomous Toad
description: A bloated amphibian the size of a dog, its warty skin glistening with toxic secretions. It croaks menacingly.

name: Bramble Beast
description: A hulking creature woven from living thorns and twisted branches. Flowers bloom incongruously among its razor-sharp limbs.

name: Elder Treant
description: An ancient tree brought to terrible life. Its trunk-like arms could crush stone, and its roots writhe beneath the soil.

name: Cave Spider
description: A pale, eyeless spider adapted to the deep darkness. It hunts by sensing vibrations through its web-covered tunnels.

name: Rock Beetle
description: A beetle the size of a shield, its carapace as hard as stone. It charges with surprising speed, mandibles clacking.

name: Crystal Drake
description: A serpentine creature armored in crystalline scales that refract light into dazzling patterns. Its breath carries shards of razor-sharp crystal.

name: Deep Wurm
description: A massive segmented worm that burrows through solid rock. Rows of grinding teeth line its circular maw.

name: Skeleton Warrior
description: The animated bones of a long-dead soldier, still clutching a rusted sword. Empty eye sockets glow with faint blue light.

name: Cursed Spirit
description: A translucent shade drifting through the ruins, its face twisted in eternal anguish. Cold radiates from its spectral form.

name: Dark Knight
description: A towering suit of enchanted armor animated by dark magic. Each footstep shakes the ground, and its blade trails shadows.

name: Lich Remnant
description: The decayed remains of a once-powerful sorcerer, still crackling with residual magic. Dark energy swirls around its skeletal fingers.
